name: Ataraxy
description: Ataraxy is a GlobalGameJam 2021 game whose theme was Lost-Found. Ataraxy is a narrative game whose aim is to collect artefacts, each representing different emotions, in order to achieve ataraxia (the tranquility of the soul). The design of the game essentially has 2 phases: placing the player in a kind of labyrinth, and a more technical phase, consisting in probing a 3-dimensional area to find the invisible artifact.
